name: Joe Bezos wants his bitcoins back
name_original: Joe Bezos wants his bitcoins back
description:
You work for joe bezos and go get his bitcoins. This game s a 2D platformer, with good controls and perfect character  momentum this makes a great challenge for speed runners. This game was origninaly made for a game jam but the school started and i needed to hurry up but i think it turned out pretty good.

Controls

A,D/left arrow,right arrow = go left/right

W/Up arrow = jump, float, double jump
